# PESTO
## *P*esticide management *E*valuation *S*ys*T*em, *O*pen-source

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of PESTO is to provide functions to intake elicitation data from the ADOPT-IPM project and create easy-to-interpret visualizations. Watch for the PESTO-VIZ online tool, coming soon...

## Installation

You can install the development version of PESTO from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("vanichols/PESTO")
```

## Example

Hang on

```{r example}
library(PESTO)
## basic example code
```
